definition: of a very dark grey, a stick of black carbon material used for drawing, to draw, trace, or represent with charcoal
details:
adjective
- of a very dark grey
= synonyms: charcoal-grey, charcoal-gray
noun
- a stick of black carbon material used for drawing
= synonyms: fusain
- a drawing made with a stick of black carbon material
- a very dark grey color
= synonyms: charcoal grey, charcoal gray, oxford grey, oxford gray
- a carbonaceous material obtained by heating wood or other organic matter in the absence of air
= synonyms: wood coal
verb
- to draw, trace, or represent with charcoal
